OOC: Ok.  I'm going to post with Abominus in this post too.  Sorry if I mis=
s any damage!  And also, rAuq or Jer or whoever, what are you going to do w=
ith Symphony?  And Airly, where did I leave off with Orchestra and what sho=
uld he be doing?  Hehe, I'm trying to get back on track!  And also Yan, is =
Lavatron still at the CF?  I don't know, so I'm just going to have Surgital=
 attack the CF.  Also, I'm not sure of what weapons Abominus has, so I don'=
t know what weapon he'll fire, so that will be up to you guys.

::Abominus/=
Surgital/Composer/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin::

     Abominus was hit in the le=
ft shoulder by a few missiles, and his body tilted more to the left and he =
stumbled back a bit.  Then, more missiles came from Galaxor and Element.  H=
e put out his arm to try and block.  Some of the missiles hit his arm and d=
amaged it a bit, and some got past and hit him in the chest.  Abominus fire=
d 2 shots from his weapon at Galaxor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
         Surgital aimed his elbow at the CF, and fired a missile fro=
m his elbow at it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Comp=
oser decided to flee back to the Alliance base.

        "Commander Zardus,=
 I'm heading back to the Alliance base, sir," Composer said in his com to Z=
ardus.

        Then, Composer used his jetpack and thrusted off towards th=
e Alliance Island.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Trig=
gerhappy and Skullgrin nodded at eachother at Megatron's orders, then walke=
d outside, and went to Megatron's location.

         "Triggerhappy reporti=
ng for duty sir!" Triggerhappy said, saluting.

          Skullgrin saluted=
 as well, but remained silent.
